name: XWUI Color Picker Component
description: Color picker input component for selecting colors. Supports hex, RGB, and HSL formats. Includes color swatch preview, text input, and optional color presets. Uses XWUIInput internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

format.description: Color format for input and output

showText.description: Whether to show text input for color value

allowClear.description: Whether to allow clearing the color value

presets.description: Array of preset color values to display

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the color picker

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Current color value in the specified format
